channel.title: Cache help
channel.description:
Okay just got back into the rsps community and i was hoping someone can help me remember how to change were my players download my cache
Im running a 718 client is there anywhere i can edit the cache download so people can download cache from say dropbox
any ideas?
i know older servers where cacheloader.java
but im lost on 718's its been forever
thanks everyone :)
